schema.title: Response Media Comments Chunk Gql Comments Chunk Get

x-codeSamples.source:
from hikerapi import Client

cl = Client(<ACCESS_KEY>)
comments, end_cursor = await cl.comments_chunk_gql(
    media_id="3162273595027945978", end_cursor=None
)
x-codeSamples.label: Python

x-codeSamples.source:
from hikerapi import Client

cl = Client(<ACCESS_KEY>)
items_list = []
end_cursor = None
while True:
    items, end_cursor = cl.comments_chunk_gql("3162273595027945978", end_cursor=end_cursor)
    items_list.extend(items)
    if not end_cursor:
        break
x-codeSamples.label: Python

get.description:
Download story file by URL to file
(you can take it from "/v1/story/by/id" or "/v1/story/by/url")

Example: https://scontent-lga3-1.cdnins...ram.com/v/t66.30100-16/
    310890533_1622838408176007_5601749632271872566_n.mp4?efg=...

parameters.name: name

schema.description:
Please make sure to use a clean hashtag without any special symbols. 

**Good one**: love, sea, dog,  

**Bad one**: #dog, sea_., tanjung.., #.

**Bad one**: #dog, sea_., tanjung.., #.

tags.name: /v1/user
tags.description: Get user, followers and following users

tags.name: /v1/search
tags.description: Search by hashtags, users and music tracks

tags.name: /v1/fbsearch
tags.description: Search by Facebook places (GEO, locations) and users

tags.name: /v2/user
tags.description: Get user, followers and following users (raw response)

tags.name: /gql/media
tags.description: Get posts and likers from Web API (GraphQL)

tags.name: /gql/user
tags.description: Get user info from Web API (GraphQL)
